thread.section_title: Film Review News | Wall Street Journal
thread.title: ‘RBG’ Courting Progress

author: Joe Morgenstern
title: ‘RBG’ Courting Progress
text: ‘RBG,” a documentary about Supreme Court Justice Ruth Bader Ginsburg, begins by quoting some of her more outspoken critics. She is, we hear without attribution, a witch, an evil-doer, a monster and a zombie, among other things. She is additionally, in the unmistakable voice of Donald Trump, an “absolute disgrace to the Supreme Court.” That’s a lot to live up to, and this film, by Julie Cohen and Betsy West, doesn’t deliver the denunciatory goods. Its purpose is celebratory and its tone is fond, though there’s ample acknowledgment of the controversies that continue to swirl around its subject, as she continues to issue...
